description.narrative: Applying disaster risk reduction measures that target not only vulnerable communities but also their degraded ecosystems (Resilience Framework).
Haiti experiences high vulnerabilities from natural disasters and economic insecurity, this project empowers the local population to have a flourishing community.
South East of Haiti, La Vallée de Jacmel.
The vulnerable population in La Vallée de Jacmel Jacmel, South East of Haiti - appr. 36 000 people

sector.narrative: Multisector aid for basic social services

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation

title.narrative: # Governance Committee work plans is available.
The Haitian Red Cross Regional Committee dispose of a Contingency Stock able to cover needs in case of hurricane or tropical storm.
